snippet: Matt Cain and the San Francisco Giants agreed to a six-year, $127.5 million contract, the largest deal for a right-handed pitcher in baseball history.
lead_paragraph: Matt Cain and the San Francisco Giants agreed to a six-year, $127.5 million contract, the largest deal for a right-handed pitcher in baseball history.

headline.main: Giants Give Cain Record $127.5 Million Contract
headline.print_headline: Giants Give Cain Record $127.5 Million Contract
